name: pytrader
description: Python/TypeScript trading system with real-time charts and analytics

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:services && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:clean: npm run clean:dist && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently -n shared,gateway,market-data,analytics,frontend -c blue,green,yellow,magenta,cyan "npm run dev --workspace=shared" "npm run dev --workspace=services/gateway" "npm run dev --workspace=services/market-data" "npm run dev:analytics" "npm run dev --workspace=frontend"
scripts.dev:ts: concurrently -n shared,gateway,market-data,frontend -c blue,green,yellow,cyan "npm run dev --workspace=shared" "npm run dev --workspace=services/gateway" "npm run dev --workspace=services/market-data" "npm run dev --workspace=frontend"
scripts.dev:analytics: cd services/analytics && (test -x .venv/bin/uvicorn || (echo "[analytics] Missing services/analytics/.venv; run: make python-env" && exit 1)) && .venv/bin/uvicorn src.main:app --reload --port 4002
scripts.clean: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:modules
scripts.setup:python: cd services/analytics && uv venv .venv && UV_PROJECT_ENVIRONMENT=.venv uv pip install -r requirements.txt
